Class SelectableListenerEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.util.notification.SelectableListenerEntry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISelectableListenerEntry, Serializable, EventListener

    public class SelectableListenerEntry
extends Object
implements ISelectableListenerEntry, Serializable
    Default implementation of ISelectableListenerEntry.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SelectableListenerEntry(EventListener listener)
      Non exclusive listener, removed on exception, always notified (no selector).

      Non exclusive listener, removed on exception.
      SelectableListenerEntry(ISelector selector, EventListener listener, boolean exclusive, boolean removeOnException)
      Create selectable listener with given characteristics.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SelectableListenerEntry

        public SelectableListenerEntry(ISelector selector,
                               EventListener listener,
                               boolean exclusive,
                               boolean removeOnException)
        Create selectable listener with given characteristics.
        Parameters:
        selector - Determines conditions under which this listener will be notified. May be null.
        listener - Actual listener.
        exclusive - True is this listener is exclusive.
        removeOnException - True if this entry should be removed if there is a problem notifying it.

      • SelectableListenerEntry

        public SelectableListenerEntry(ISelector selector,
                               EventListener listener)
        Non exclusive listener, removed on exception.
        Parameters:
        selector - selector
        listener - Actual listener.
        See Also:
        SelectableListenerEntry(ISelector, EventListener, boolean, boolean )

      • SelectableListenerEntry

        public SelectableListenerEntry(EventListener listener)
        Non exclusive listener, removed on exception, always notified (no selector).
        Parameters:
        listener - Actual listener.
        See Also:
        SelectableListenerEntry(ISelector, EventListener, boolean, boolean )

      • isExclusive

        public boolean isExclusive()
        Description copied from interface: ISelectableListenerEntry
        True if this is an exclusive listener.

        If this is selected, no other exclusive listener will be.

        Specified by:
        isExclusive in interface ISelectableListenerEntry
        Returns:
        True if exclusive listener.

      • isRemoveOnException

        Description copied from interface: ISelectableListenerEntry

      • setSelector

        public void setSelector(ISelector selector)
        Description copied from interface: ISelectableListenerEntry
        Set selector to be associated with this entry.

        A null selector is equivalent to a selector that always returns true, so that the associated listener will always be notified.

        Specified by:
        setSelector in interface ISelectableListenerEntry
        Parameters:
        selector - Selector to associate with this entry. May be null.
